docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to the documentation.

Currently the API is found on https://zz.theclashfruit.me and the CDN on https://zz-cdn.theclashfruit.me.

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text:
1. What is ZryteZene?

    tba

docs.title: Awesome
docs.text:
Projects using our API.

  • No projects yet. 😔

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
Currently, you cannot really contribute, as most of the code is in private repositories, as the team has not yet talked about the way we will develop ZryteZene (with or without the code contributing community).

As for the documentation, if you feel something is missing you can always open a pull request, or an issue.

Open-Source repositories:

  • git.theclasfruit.me/ThatCakeID/zz-cli (Active)
  • github.com/ThatCakeID/zz-android-old (Archive)
  • github.com/ThatCakeID/zzcli (Archive)

docs.title: Music
docs.text:
Warning

The /api/v1/music/* endpoints are still under heavy development and breaking changes are to be expected.

docs.title: Music Status Codes
docs.text: Status Code Processing 0 Withheld 1 Private 2 Public 3

docs.title: Uploading
docs.text:
Note

Uploading is a bit tedious due to the fact the metadata extraction is done on the backend.

A basic view of the uploading process:

  1. Upload the music: PUT /api/v1/music/upload (multipart/form-data) 
    file=[file.ogg]
  2. Review the metadata.
  3. Upload the changed metadata: PATCH /api/v1/music/:uuid (multipart/form-data) 
    thumbnail=[file.jpg]
data={ ..., "status": 3 }

docs.title: 1. PUT /api/v1/music/upload
docs.text:
Upload a music.

Headers: 

Authorization: Bearer a.jwt.token
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Body: 

file=[file.ogg]

200 OK 
{
"status": 1,
"message": "Successfully uploaded music.",
"messageCode": "MUSIC_UPLOADED",
"data": {
"uuid": "f34fa77d-02b3-46fa-864f-218a8bb8f399",
"author": "a49171b1-cb49-41bd-aa3d-2e53aca2e1d3",
"url": "https://zz-cdn.theclashfruit.me/f34fa77d-02b3-46fa-864f-218a8bb8f399/Martin_Garrix___Bebe_Rexha_-_In_The_Name_Of_Love__Official_Video_.mp3",
"thumbnail": "https://zz-cdn.theclashfruit.me/f34fa77d-02b3-46fa-864f-218a8bb8f399/thumbnail.jpg",

docs.title: 2. PATCH /api/v1/music/:uuid
docs.text:
Update the metadata of a music.

Headers: 

Authorization: Bearer a.jwt.token
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Body: 

thumbnail=[file.jpg]
data={
  "status": 3,
  "metaData": {
    "title": "...",
    "authors": [ "..." ],
    "genre": "...",
    "year": "2023"
  }
}

200 OK 
{
"status": 1,
"message": "Successfully uploaded music.",
"messageCode": "MUSIC_UPLOADED",
"data": {
"uuid": "f34fa77d-02b3-46fa-864f-218a8bb8f399",
"author": "a49171b1-cb49-41bd-aa3d-2e53aca2e1d3",

docs.title: GET /api/v1/music
docs.text:

docs.text: Refer to Uploading > GET /api/v1/music/upload.

docs.title: PATCH /api/v1/music/:uuid
docs.text: Refer to Uploading > PATCH /api/v1/music/:uuid.

docs.title: DELETE /api/v1/music/:uuid
docs.text:
Delete a music by its uuid.

Headers: 

Authorization: Bearer a.jwt.token

200 OK404 Not Found401 Unauthorized 
{
"status": 1,
"message": "Successfully deleted music.",
"messageCode": "MUSIC_DELETED",
"data": null
}

{
"status": 1,
"message": "Music not found.",
"messageCode": "NOT_FOUND",
"data": null
}

{
"status": 1,
"message": "You are not the author of this music.",
"messageCode": "UNAUTHORIZED",
"data": null
}

docs.title: User
docs.text:
Warning

The /api/v1/user/* endpoints are still under heavy development and breaking changes are to be expected.

docs.title: GET /api/v1/user/@me
docs.text:
Get the currently logged-in user.

Headers: 

Authorization: Bearer a.jwt.token

200 OK404 Not Found 
{
"status": 1,
"message": "Successfully fetched user!",
"messageCode": "SUCCESS_FETCH_USER",
"data": {
"uuid": "182d17a4-c31a-11ed-afa1-0242ac120002",
"username": "example",
"email": "example@example.com",
"bio": "bio",
"avatar": "https://zz-cdn.theclashfruit.me/userImage.png",
"createdAt": 1678875181
"updatedAt": 1678875181
}
}

{
"status": 0,
"message": "User not found!",
"messageCode": "NOT_FOUND",
"data": null
}

docs.title: GET /api/v1/version
docs.text:
Returns the version of the API and the front-ends.

200 OK500 Internal Server Error 
{
"status": 1,
"message": "A random message for every request!",
"messageCode": "RANDOM_MESSAGE",
"data": {
"api": {

"versionName": "v1-0.1.0-beta",

docs.title: zz-cli
docs.text: A CLI app for ZryteZene written in Rust.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
$ zz-cli -h
Usage: zz-cli <COMMAND>

Commands:
  login  Login to the ZryteZene APIs.
  music  Music commands.
  tui    Terminal UI for ZryteZene.
  help   Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)
Options:
  -h, --help  Print help

docs.title: Compiling
docs.text:
1. $ git clone https://git.theclashfruit.me/ThatCakeID/zz-cli.git.
  2. $ cd zz-cli.
  3. $ cargo build or $ cargo build --release for a smaller size.

docs.title: Where is everything located?:
docs.text:
• src/commands: All available commands for the user.
  • src/tui: The Terminal UI version (zz-cli tui).
  • src/utils: Frequently used functions in the app.
  • src/structs: Structs for Serde for the API jsons.

docs.title: Commit message guide:
docs.text:
• docs: commit_message: Used when adding something to the docs.
  • feat: commit_message: Used when adding something to the app.
  • fix: commit_message: Used when fixing something in the app.

docs.title: Pull Request guide:
docs.text: • Just describe your changes in an understandable way.
